text:
Version 116.0.1938.98: September 29, 2023 
Version 116.0.1938.98: September 29, 2023 
Fixed various bugs and performance issues. 
Important 
This update to Extended Stable channel contains a fix for  
CVE-2023-5217 
, which has been reported by the Chromium team as having an exploit in the wild. For more information, see the  
Security Update Guide 
. 
Stable channel security updates are listed  
here 
.
title: Version 116.0.1938.98: September 29, 2023
